successes.title: Carbon 6 Forged Carbon Fiber Glow Rings
successes.description: Our forged carbon rings offer a unique, modern take on the traditional wedding band. Please help us bring these rings to the world!

Pledges.description: EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring. Retails at $125. These will be the first to ship!
A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring.

Thanks to our unique forging method, all of our rings have a beautiful marbled design that catches light to reveal deep, radiant layers. On the inside, this ring has a satin feel that’s hand finished to a comfort fit that’s extremely smooth against the skin, and it’s so lightweight you’ll probably forget it’s on most of the time. Retails at $125.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring with a luminescent insert.

Our luminescent insert is made of the same non-toxic material used in luxury Swiss watches. Charge it up with natural sunlight or a UV bulb for an intense glow that is rechargeable for 10+ years. The ring is hand-finished to a smooth comfort fit. Retails at $205.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring with a silver inlay. Retails at $170.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring with a luminescent insert.

Our luminescent insert is made of the same non-toxic material used in luxury Swiss watches. Charge it up with natural sunlight or a UV bulb for an intense glow that is rechargeable for 10+ years. The ring is hand-finished to a smooth comfort fit. Retails at $205.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
Two Forged Carbon Fiber Rings
Get two carbon fiber rings, which can be either the same size or two difference sizes. Save $20 plus the cost of additional shipping compared with buying the two rings separately.
NEW PRODUCT! Forged carbon fiber ring with luminescent insert and silver inlay.

Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring and One Forged Carbon Fiber with Luminescent Insert
Get one of each in whatever sizes you wish for $20 less than the cost of ordering each separately.
A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring with a silver insert.
Each silver insert is done by hand and polished to a brilliant finish, offering a modern take on the traditional wedding band. The ring is hand-finished to a smooth comfort fit. Retails at $235.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
Two Forged Carbon Fiber Rings with Silver Inlay

Get two of our forged carbon fiber rings with silver inlay, which can be either the same size or two different sizes. Save $20 plus the cost of additional shipping compared with buying the two rings separately.

Set of two rings: One Forged Carbon with Luminescent insert + One Forged Carbon with Silver Inlay. This is $15 less then if the two were bought seperately. Which can be either the same size or two different sizes.
A hand-forged and finished carbon fiber ring with a silver insert and silver inlay. Retails at $275.
Sizes 5 through 14 available.
Two Luminescent Rings

By popular demand, this reward allows for the purchase of two luminescent rings, which can be either the same size or two different sizes. Save $20 plus the cost of additional shipping compared with buying the two rings separately.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber and One Forged Carbon Fiber with Silver Insert
Get one of each in whatever sizes you wish for $20 less than the cost of ordering each separately.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring w/ Luminescent Insert and Silver Inlay + One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Silver Inlay
Get both rings for $20 less than the cost of purchasing both separately. Choose either the same or different sizes.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Luminescent Insert and Silver Inlay + One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Luminescent Insert
Get both rings for $20 less than the cost of purchasing separately. Choose either the same or different sizes.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Silver Insert and One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Silver Insert and Silver Inlay
Get one of each in whatever sizes you wish for $20 less than the cost of ordering each separately.

Set of two rings: One Forged Carbon with Luminescent insert  + One Forged Carbon with Silver Insert. This is $25 less then if the two were bought seperately. Which can be either the same size or two different sizes.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring and One Forged Carbon Fiber with Silver Insert and Silver Inlay
Get both rings for $20 less than the cost of purchasing separately.
Set of Two Forged Carbon Fiber rings with luminescent insert and silver inlay
Get both rings for $25 less than the cost of purchasing each individually. Rings can either be the same size or different sizes.
Set of Two Rings: One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Silver Inlay and One Forged Carbon Fiber Ring with Silver Insert and Silver Inlay
Get both rings for $20 less than the cost of purchasing both separately.
